snippet: Mr. Dickey, half of the soul duo James and Bobby Purify, reached the pop Top 10 in 1966 with the song “I’m Your Puppet.”
abstract: Robert Dickey, guitarist and singer who was half of the duo that recorded the hit song I’m Your Puppet, dies at age 72.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Dickey, half of the soul duo James and Bobby Purify, reached the pop Top 10 in 1966 with the song “I’m Your Puppet.”

headline.seo: Robert Dickey, ‘I’m Your Puppet’ Singer, Is Dead at 72
headline.main: Robert Dickey, ‘I’m Your Puppet’ Singer, Dies at 72
